description:
My place is a 10 min walk to Central Park, Target, Aldi, Patsy's Pizzeria, Marshalls & Columbia University. You’ll love it because of the coziness and spaciousness of my true 1 bed Apt & the convenient location, 2 blocks away from the Subway & Supermarket. Area full of lively ambiance and restaurants. Great to get away from the crowds of midtown and experience the real life of a NewYorker. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

True 1 bed 1 bath apartment. Historical building. It is conveniently located in the 1st floor.  Very cozy, warm and clean. Perfect for a couple

Entire Apartment

Historical and safe neighborhood. Surrounded by all necessary amenities: subway, supermarkets, restaurants, flower shops, barber shops, Mont Sinai Hospital, Columbia University, Central Park...

2 blocks away from the subway. 6 line (uptown and downtown). 15 mins away to Grand Central.
name: Summer Get-Away in Cozy Spacious 1Bdr Apt
review: Um apartamento aconchegante e arrumado. A Rocio foi uma muito atenciosa e me ajudou muito antes, durante e depois da minha estadia.
